ai-patthana8.36:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_0: consciousness arises dependent on the Teaching,
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_1: consciousness arises dependent on the Teaching,
ai-patthana8.36:1.1_2: Thoughts that are not dependent on the teaching, and these things don’t arise for a reason.
ai-patthana8.36:2.1_0: Not by means of principles, conditioned by right effort.
ai-patthana8.36:2.1_1: consciousness arises dependent on the Teaching,
ai-patthana8.36:2.1_2: Thoughts that are not dependent on the teaching don’t arise, and because of that.
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_0: nor do you have a cause or condition for the sake of mental factors?
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_1: nor do you have a cause or condition for the sake of mental factors?
ai-patthana8.36:3.1_2: He doesn’t teach Dhamma to others, and because of a cause of reasons, he doesn’t arise in terms of causes and reasons.
